naslov: Trogir, dvoetažna dvojna stambena kuća s mogućnošću nadogradnje, 238m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Dvoetažna dvojna kuća u srcu Trogira s 238 kvadrata stambene površine, uz dodatnih 17 kvadrata garažnog prostora i konobu od 14 kvadrata. Sastoji se od dva vrlo prostrana stana sličnih tlocrta s dvije i tri spavaće sobe, dnevnog boravka, blagovaonice i kuhinje kao jedne cjeline i po jedne kupaonice i WC-a. Svaki stan ima svoj zaseban ulaz kao i svoj natkriveni balkon. Prizemlje ima i svoju verandu, dok prvi kat i dodatni natkriveni balkon. Pokraj zgrade je i garaža s jednim parkirnim mjestom, konoba te izdašni vrt od oko 116 kvadrata. Stanovi su u vrlo dobrom stanju i iziskuju relativno mala ulaganja u adaptaciju i osvježenje. Dolaze potpuno namješteni, opremljeni klima uređajima, bežičnim internetom, internet televizijom, vrtnim stolom i stolicama te roštiljom. Nekretnina se nalazi u vrlo mirnom dijelu Trogira, priključena je na svu potrebnu infrastrukturu i ima sve dodatne sadržaje u neposrednoj blizini. Posjeduje i građevinsku dozvolu za izgradnju još jednog kata. Nekretnina je idealna za smještaj jedne proširene ili dvije pune obitelji, za turističko ili stambeno iznajmljivanje kao i za dogradnju i preuređenje u šest stambenih odnosno apartmanskih jedinica, uključujući i krovnu terasu s prekrasnim pogledom na more i okolicu. Vrtni prostor može lako zaprimiti dodatna parkirna mjesta, kao i bazen, već prema želji. --- Two-storey semi-detached house in the heart of Trogir, with 238 square meters of living space, with an additional 17 square meters of garage space and a tavern of 14 square meters. It consists of two very spacious apartments with similar floor plans featuring two and three bedrooms, living room, dining room and kitchen as one unit and a bathroom and toilet each. Each apartment has its own separate entrance and its own covered balcony. The ground floor also has its own veranda, and the first floor an additional covered balcony. Next to the building is a garage with one parking space, a tavern and a generous garden of about 116 square meters. The apartments are in very good condition and require relatively modest investment in renovation and refreshment. They come fully furnished, equipped with air conditioning units, wireless internet, internet TV, garden table and chairs and barbecue. The property is located in a very quiet part of Trogir, is connected to all necessary infrastructure and has all the additional facilities in the immediate vicinity. It also possesses a building permit to build another floor. The property is ideal to house one extended or two full families, for tourist or residential rental as well as for upgrading and remodeling into six residential or apartment units, including a roof terrace with beautiful view of the sea and the surrounding area. The garden area can easily accommodate additional parking spaces, as well as a swimming pool, as desired.
